query:
Research quantum error correction advances from peer-reviewed academic papers in Nature, Science, or Physical Review journals published in 2024.

Context: Academic literature review requiring rigorous verification of peer-reviewed sources only from top-tier physics journals.

Goal: Identify minimum 5 peer-reviewed papers with complete citation details (journal name, publication date, DOI) and extract key findings on quantum error correction advances.

Strict constraints:
- ONLY Nature, Science, or Physical Review journals (PRL, PRA, PRX, etc.)
- ONLY peer-reviewed papers from 2024
- EXCLUDE: preprints, news, blogs, corporate announcements, arXiv
- Domain restrictions: nature.com, science.org, journals.aps.org

Focus areas:
1) Surface codes and topological error correction
2) Error rates and fidelity improvements
3) Experimental demonstrations of error correction
4) Scalability and fault-tolerant quantum computing
5) Novel error correction schemes (LDPC, other codes)

Success criteria per search:
- Verify journal is Nature/Science/Physical Review
- Confirm 2024 publication date
- Extract DOI, full title, authors
- Extract specific quantitative findings (error rates, fidelity, qubit counts)
- Cross-verify source authenticity
